title: Timesheet Evo
subtitle: Indipendent Project
description: I indipendently developed a Web Application by myself: Timesheet Evo.
It is a Web Application to manage Timesheets, Expense Notes and Leaves of employees.
The website contains a landing paging that brifley shows the functionalities of the application and, after the user is logged-in, the real managment application can be used.
